title.rendered: Blackrock Services India Ltd donated 7 bicycles through Smile Foundation’s ‘Build a Bike Challenge’ to a Mission Education Centre

content.rendered: Blackrock Services India Ltd donated 7 bicycles through Smile Foundation’s ‘Build a Bike Challenge’ to a Mission Education Centre in Gurugram, Haryana. 26 employees participated in this activity, starting with an ice breaker with the children wherein employees played dog and the bone with children. Following this, the competition between the teams started to Build the fastest Bike. The kids were overwhelmed and enjoyed whole heartedly.
